  build:

    runs-on: ubuntu-lat

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v1
    - name: Run a one-line script
      run: echo Hello, world!
    - name: Run a mu first repositoryti-line script
      run: |
        echo Add other actions ld,
        echo test, and deploy your project first repos
